This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Should be Composite (only .ttf)

Should be Composite (only .ttf)

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

glyf

-/-

Glyphs (LATIN) which are made from components.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'NULL' (uni0000) (ID 1) = '0'.
'gravecomb' (uni0300) (ID 361) = '0'.
'acutecomb' (uni0301) (ID 362) = '0'.
'tildecomb' (uni0303) (ID 363) = '0'.
'hookabovecomb' (uni0309) (ID 364) = '0'.
'dotbelowcomb' (uni0323) (ID 365) = '0'.

Info

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

-/-

-/-

Unnecessary tables (private tables and embedded bitmap tables).

OK: No unnecessary tables.

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

DSIG

-/-

Necessary tables.

'DSIG' is missing. Please investigate.

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Italic

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True the OS/2 panose array form flag should be an 'Oblique' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is an 'Oblique' entry.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0000

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0000.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0x2122

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0x2122.

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

static font

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

cmap

cmap(0, 3, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(0, 3, 0) contains U+0000

Error

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

cmap

cmap(0, 3, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni000D is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'QuireSans-Regular'

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
You may use this font as permitted by the EULA for the product in which this font is included to display and print content. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. This web font file is intended for use with the Microsoft Sway application only, and not for further use or distribution of any kind.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Warning

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

'Quire is a trademark of Monotype Imaging Inc. and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

12 NID MS

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
You may use this font as permitted by the EULA for the product in which this font is included to display and print content. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. This web font file is intended for use with the Microsoft Sway application only, and not for further use or distribution of any kind.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'

Pass

MS is: 'Quire Sans'

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'
MS is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0, Copyright

'Copyright' has leading or trailing spaces.

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc.[  ]All rights reserved.'

Error

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '10'
'Quire Sans'

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mac NID 8/13

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
You may use this font as permitted by the EULA for the product in which this font is included to display and print content. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. This web font file is intended for use with the Microsoft Sway application only, and not for further use or distribution of any kind.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '10'
'Quire Sans'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Sm, Extra, Demi, Ultra, X, Dm, Ex, Xtra'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name/OS/2

MS NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Quire Sans'

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Quire Sans Italic' = NID 1 'Quire Sans' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.12;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.12'.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'QuireSans-Italic'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

MS NID 6

Warning

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

'Quire is a trademark of Monotype Imaging Inc. and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

12 NID MS

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
You may use this font as permitted by the EULA for the product in which this font is included to display and print content. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. This web font file is intended for use with the Microsoft Sway application only, and not for further use or distribution of any kind.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'
MS is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0, Copyright

'Copyright' has leading or trailing spaces.

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc.[  ]All rights reserved.'

Error

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.12;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.12'.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '14'
'QuireSans-Bold'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
You may use this font as permitted by the EULA for the product in which this font is included to display and print content. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. This web font file is intended for use with the Microsoft Sway application only, and not for further use or distribution of any kind.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Warning

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0, Copyright

'Copyright' has leading or trailing spaces.

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc.[  ]All rights reserved.'

Error

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0

MS NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '10'
'Quire Sans'

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Quire Sans Bold' = NID 1 'Quire Sans' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'
MS is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'

Pass

Error

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '10'
'Quire Sans'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Sm, Extra, Demi, Ultra, X, Dm, Ex, Xtra'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Quire Sans'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Quire Sans Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Quire Sans' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.12;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.12'.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'QuireSans-BoldItalic'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSans-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BoldItalic'

Warning

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Quire is a trademark of Monotype Imaging Inc. and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Pass

name

11 NID Mac

OK: NID 11 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

12 NID Mac

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
You may use this font as permitted by the EULA for the product in which this font is included to display and print content. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. This web font file is intended for use with the Microsoft Sway application only, and not for further use or distribution of any kind.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Warning

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0, Copyright

'Copyright' has leading or trailing spaces.

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc.[  ]All rights reserved.'

but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2014, 2016, 2018 Monotype Imaging Inc. All rights reserved.'

Pass

MS is: 'Quire Sans'

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'
MS is: 'Quire Sans is a typeface family designed by the Jim Ford. It consists of 10 weights plus Italics. The families look and feel can be described as: Friendly or serious - depending on the context - understated, sturdy and graceful. The forms are based on classic Roman lines and proportions, so it‘s naturally very legible. Quire Sans is rooted in traditional book typography and draws inspiration from centuries of typographic development. All wrapped up in a fresh and tidy family for modern media.'

Pass

MS is: 'http://www.monotype.com'

name

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 14, License URL' (Mac/Roman/English)

License URL is present.

Error

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 16 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 16, Typographic Family Name' (Mac/Roman/English)

Typographic Family Name NID 16 (Mac/Roman/English) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 17 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 17, Typographic Subfamily Name' (Mac/Roman/English)

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (Mac/Roman/English) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:

Mac NID 0

'Quire Sans Pro Light'

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Sm, Extra, Demi, Ultra, X, Dm, Ex, Xtra'

'Quire Sans Pro Light'

name/head

Mac NID 5

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'QuireSansPro-Light'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Warning

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

'Quire Sans is a trademark of Monotype Imaging Inc. and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

12 NID Mac

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Quire Sans Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Quire Sans Pro Light'.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Quire Sans Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Quire Sans Pro Light'.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

name

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

'Quire Sans Pro'

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com'
MS is: 'This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com'

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0, Copyright

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Copyright © 2014 Monotype Imaging Inc.[  ]All rights reserved.'

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'QuireSansPro-LightItalic'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

11 NID Mac

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

12 NID Mac

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 12 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

14 NID Mac

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Quire Sans Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Quire Sans Pro Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

'Quire Sans Pro'

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0, Copyright

'Copyright' has leading or trailing spaces.

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Copyright © 2014 Monotype Imaging Inc.[  ]All rights reserved.'

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Quire Sans Pro Light Italic' = NID 1 'Quire Sans Pro Light' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'QuireSansPro-LightItalic'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'QuireSansPro-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

Trademark is not registered or fontSniffer is not up-to-date. Please get in contact with the tools team.

name

12 NID MS

Error

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype here: www.monotype.com
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

14 NID MS

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

OK: NID 14 is 'http://www.monotype.com'

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Quire Sans Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Quire Sans Pro Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

name

Windows NID 10 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 10, Description' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Description NID 10 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Warning

Quire Sans Pro Light Regular (quiresanspro-light.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

Pass

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Warning

Quire Sans Pro Light Italic (quiresanspro-lightitalic.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Quire Sans Regular (quiresans-regular.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Quire Sans Italic (quiresans-italic.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold (quiresans-bold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Quire Sans Bold Italic (quiresans-bolditalic.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

post

PostScript names
